title: Designing Digital Game-Based Language Development Strategies for Children with Language Delays

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language development theory and digital educational tool experience
context.additional_context: Targeting child education service managers/leaders within corporations, aimed at strengthening competencies in designing education programs for children with language delays

learning_goals: Learners can design vocabulary expansion strategies for children with language delays using digital game-based teaching methods.
Explain how to apply game elements (reward systems, interactive activities) aligned with language development objectives
Propose strategies to manage potential side effects such as distraction and over-engagement when utilizing digital games

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
